promptImprover.systemPromptPreset.markdownDescription:
Choose the improvement style. **All presets receive the same rich context** (workspace, Git, conversation, files) - they differ in how much detail they add:

- **Concise**: Minimal elaboration, focused improvements (fastest)
- **Balanced**: Good detail without over-engineering (recommended)
- **Detailed**: Comprehensive, production-ready specifications (most thorough)

**Note:** Context inclusion is controlled by the settings below, not by the preset.

promptImprover.systemPrompt.markdownDescription:
**View/Edit System Prompt** - Shows the current preset content. You can edit this directly to create a custom prompt.

**Editing this field:** Your changes will be preserved and used instead of the preset.

**Available placeholders:** `{userPrompt}`, `{languages}`, `{technologies}`, `{openFiles}`

promptImprover.modelFamily.markdownDescription:
**Model Selection:** Specify which model to use for prompt improvement, or leave empty to use the current chat model.

**Leave empty** (recommended): Uses whatever model you have selected in Copilot Chat (falls back to gpt-4o-mini if no model is selected)  
**Specify a model**: Always use a specific model (e.g., `gpt-4o`, `claude-sonnet-4`, `gemini-2.5-pro`)

**Default fallback**: gpt-4o-mini (fastest, free with Copilot subscription)

**Commands:**  
[Select Model](command:prompt-improver.selectModel) | [List Available Models](command:prompt-improver.listAvailableModels)

promptImprover.includeWorkspaceMetadata.markdownDescription:
**Include Workspace Metadata** - Detects languages, frameworks, and open file names from your workspace.

**Why:** Improved prompts reference your actual tech stack (e.g., "using React and TypeScript"). **Impact:** Fast, always recommended.

promptImprover.includeConversationHistor.markdownDescription:
**Include Conversation History** - Summarizes previous chat messages to understand what you've been working on.

**Why:** Improved prompts are aware of recent work and decisions. **When to disable:** Starting a new topic. **Impact:** Fast (intelligent summarization).

promptImprover.includeMarkdownFiles.markdownDescription:
**Include Markdown Files** - Scans workspace for documentation, design docs, API specs, and guides.

**Why:** Improved prompts reference your actual project docs. **When to disable:** No project docs or large repos (slow). **Impact:** Moderate cost—scans all .md files.

promptImprover.includeOpenFileContents.markdownDescription:
**Include Open File Synopsis** - Intelligently extracts imports, exports, classes, functions, and types from open files.

**Why:** Improved prompts reference your actual code patterns. **When to disable:** Many large files open. **Impact:** Moderate cost, high value for code consistency.

promptImprover.includeGitContext.markdownDescription:
**Include Git Context** - Detects current branch, recent commits, and uncommitted changes.

**Why:** Improved prompts align with your current work. **When to disable:** Non-git projects. **Impact:** Fast (10s timeout), lightweight.

promptImprover.useWorkspaceTools.markdownDescription:
**Use Workspace Tools** - Grants the prompt improver access to search your codebase and read files.

**Why:** Deeply contextual prompts based on actual code. **When to disable:** Privacy concerns or large workspaces (slow). **Impact:** High cost—actively searches workspace.

promptImprover.filterWorkspaceTools.markdownDescription:
**Filter Workspace Tools** - Limits workspace tool access to only file/directory operations (removes grep/semantic search).

**Why:** Faster responses, lower cost while maintaining code access. **When to enable:** Always, unless you need deep search. **Impact:** Reduces tool overhead significantly.
